thread.title: No doubt the best hotel in Entebbe
thread.title_full: No doubt the best hotel in Entebbe - Review of Protea Hotel by Marriott Entebbe, Entebbe, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Safariafficionado
title: No doubt the best hotel in Entebbe
text:
This was my first time I stayed at the Protea Hotel in Entebbe and did so as part of a group of guests of the Uganda Tourism Board.
I normally pass the hotel on my way to the airport, often that is, and always wondered what the inside looks like.
Check in was swift after presenting a picture ID and a porter was at hand to help bring the bags to my room
The hotel was full and I found myself upgraded to a suite which more than met all my expectations and then some.
Spacious, well furnished with a dedicated sitting area, work area and of course the large king sized bed, was there nothing I lacked. The bathroom had a variety of amenities for guest use, showing the Marriott / Protea pedigree. Great was the extended balcony from where Lake Victoria in all its beauty was visible through the leaves of the palm trees between the hotel and the shore.
I was booked for two nights but only stayed one, being a Kampala resident, something I did regret in the end as my visit to the Protea Entebbe exceeded my expectations and I wish I had a second day to sample all their services and facilities.
All food was served from a buffet with a range of choices of cold and hot dishes, plus dessert, service was swift and the quality of the meals really good.
The hotel is adding rooms, almost doubling the present size, but without much impact on guests. It goes to show that location and service levels make the Protea a hotel in high demand and after my stay I understand why that is so.
Comes highly recommended for a first night or last night stay of guests wishing to be right close to the airport, which main gate is just a kilometre away from the hotel.
Room Tip: Upper floor rooms offer a better view across Lake Victoria See more room tips
